headline: McCormick Announces Increase in Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE: MKC) today declared an increase in the quarterly dividend from $0.42 to $0.45 per share on its common stocks, payable January 13, 2025 to shareholders of record December 30, 2024. This marks the Company's 101st year of continuous dividend payments and the 39th consecutive year it has increased its quarterly dividend.

headline: 3 Consumer Staples Stocks With Upside to Navigate Market Volatility
summary: Consumer staple stocks like INGR, MKC and COCO that have a low beta are a safe bet amid this ongoing market volatility.

headline: LANC to Acquire Atlanta-Based Sauce and Dressing Production Plant
summary: Lancaster Colony's acquisition of a sauce and dressing production facility is a strategic move to fuel ongoing growth and meet its long-term business objectives.
